results.title: Protective effect of simvastatin and rosuvastatin on trinitrobenzene sulfonic acid-induced colitis in rats
results.text_hl: Both the statins significantly increased colon length and decreased the colon weight. However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@-treatment significantly inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Colonic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003108 @@@colonic injury@@@.
